message: I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you, Bob. I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand that $900000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and it's still a significant discount from the original $1200000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I can see you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and it's still a compromise from my initial offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $995000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I can see you're getting close to your target price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $995000. I'll make one more compromise, and offer it to you for $1025000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm not willing to sell it to you for $1000000, Bob. I think you're getting a good deal, but I'm not going to give it away. I'll offer it to you for $1050000 one last time. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm willing to meet you at $1015000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
